Package application.project

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.notification.Subject
      • application.project.Project
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InfrastructureProject, SocialProject
    public abstract class Project
extends Subject
implements java.io.Serializable, IObserver
    Represents a project inside of the Application
    Author:
    Álvaro Castillo García, Alejandro Benimeli, Miguel Álvarez Valiente
    See Also:
